Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Howard. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will be available until 4:10pm to provide connecting service between Howard and Wilson in both directions.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
